mapper.select: SELECT r.FLOOR AS FLOOR, r.type as roomType, fr.NAME AS roomName, d.NAME AS deviceName, d.sn AS deviceSn, d.ID as deviceId, d.product_id, d.product_code, d.category_code FROM house_template_room r left join family_room fr on fr.template_room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN house_template_device d ON d.room_id = r.ID WHERE fr.family_id = #{familyId} AND d.house_template_id = #{templateId}

SELECT r.FLOOR AS FLOOR, fr.NAME AS roomName, d.NAME AS deviceName, d.sn AS deviceSn, d.ID as deviceId, d.product_id, d.product_code, d.category_code FROM house_template_room r left join family_room fr on fr.template_room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN house_template_device d ON d.room_id = r.ID WHERE fr.family_id = #{familyId} AND d.house_template_id = #{templateId} and d.category_code = #{categoryCode} and fr.id = #{roomId}
SELECT fr.NAME, fr.id as roomId, r.type FROM house_template_room r left join family_room fr on fr.template_room_id = r.id WHERE fr.family_id = #{familyId} order by fr.create_time asc
